name: 桜の舞う故郷
summary: 「聴いた事のない、懐かしい音楽。」 全曲生演奏でお届けする、日本の音と西洋の音が入り交じった室内楽アルバム。 初めて聴くはずなのにどこか懐かしい、柔らかな音楽をお楽しみ下さい。
info:
• 发售日期: 2012-05-08
  • 价格: ￥ 1,500
  • 录音: 密林社
  • 艺术家: 光田晋哉
  • 发行商: 密林社

disc.title: 1 桜の舞う故郷 / Prelude to Japanese Spring
2 Sonatine for Clarinet, Violin and Piano
3 Six Trios for flute, viola and piano / I. Prelude
4 Six Trios for flute, viola and piano / II. Morning Song
5 Six Trios for flute, viola and piano / III. Interlude (Tea Break)
6 Six Trios for flute, viola and piano / IV. Evening Song
7 Six Trios for flute, viola and piano / V. Nocturne
8 Six Trios for flute, viola and piano / VI. Finale
9 Sonata for shakuhachi and piano / I. Allegretto - Andante
10 Sonata for shakuhachi and piano / II. Adagio ma non troppo
